memberdef.name: STMANCOLUMN_GETPUT_SCALAR
memberdef.initializer: void StManColumn::aips_name2(get,T) (rownr_t rownr, T* dataPtr) \ { aips_name2(get,NM) (rownr, dataPtr); } \ void StManColumn::aips_name2(put,T) (rownr_t rownr, const T* dataPtr) \ { aips_name2(put,NM) (rownr, dataPtr); } \ void StManColumn::aips_name2(get,NM) (uInt, T*) \ { throwInvalidOp(CASACORE_STRINGIFY(aips_name2(get,NM))); } \ void StManColumn::aips_name2(put,NM) (uInt, const T*) \ { throwInvalidOp(CASACORE_STRINGIFY(aips_name2(put,NM))); } \
